about_the_game:
"Hello, anyone there?"

...No answer.

Wait, why won't the door open?

Suddenly, women's laughter echoes around.

Mad women are on the attack!

Solve the mysteries of the mansion and survive.

Your Ultimate Test of Survival and Wit


"Banquet of Terror – Hunted by Beauties into the Night" isn't just about being pursued; it's a complex game of cat-and-mouse where your decisions impact your survival. Navigate through a dark, mysterious mansion, solving puzzles and uncovering clues to understand the sinister secrets within.

Engaging Gameplay Mechanics


Your journey is fraught with danger and unexpected encounters. Utilize stealth and strategy to avoid your captors or confront them head-on with limited defensive options. This game blends elements of horror, puzzle-solving, and action, creating a unique adrenaline-pumping experience.

A Story of Obsession and Mystery


Unravel the story of the deranged doctor who created the AI sisters ruling the mansion. Discover diaries and notes that reveal the twisted narrative and motivations behind the madness. Each character you encounter has their own backstory, adding depth to the chilling tale.

Stunning Visuals and Atmospheric Audio


Immerse yourself in the hauntingly beautiful environments of the mansion, brought to life with detailed graphics and a spine-tingling soundtrack. The eerie soundscapes and meticulously designed characters will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Diverse Appeal for a Wide Range of Players


While "Banquet of Terror" resonates strongly with masochistic players, its intricate puzzles, gripping storyline, and immersive atmosphere will captivate a broader audience seeking a thrilling gaming experience.

Are You Ready to Face Your Fears?


Step into the shoes of a trapped protagonist, use your wits to survive, and maybe you'll find more than just escape. Will you succumb to the terror, or will you unveil the truth behind the shadows?

Join the "Banquet of Terror" and embark on an unforgettable journey of survival, mystery, and seduction.










Basic Controls
(1) Move in four directions with WASD
(2) Open the menu with ESC
(3) Click to
Pick up/throw items, examine, hide
(4) Use the flashlight with SPACE

What if you're spotted by a girl?
(1) Run away
(2) Hide (like inside a closet)
(3) Throw something

What if you're caught?
⇒ Struggle fiercely (spam W!!)

What if you find a note?
⇒ Click to read
It may not respond unless specific events have been completed beforehand.

Flashlight On/Off
Turning it on makes you easier to be spotted because the light can be detected by a girl.

The girls' detection range
Everywhere but directly behind them!

*Mature Content Description

This game contains mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences, including graphic depictions of sexual acts and extreme violence. Potential players should be aware that the game explores mature themes and situations, such as:

Explicit sexual content and nudity.
Scenes depicting extreme violence and gore.
References to sexual assault/non-consensual sex, which are handled with the intent to not glorify such acts.

Elements of BDSM.
We aim to handle these themes with sensitivity and care, but we understand that some players may find this content distressing or offensive. Please consider your comfort level with such material before purchasing or playing.

reviews:
“全クリしてからの感想。 謎解きは「落ち着いて考えればすぐ分かる」範囲なので、追いかけられて焦っているうちは必ず引っかかること間違いなし。だがそれがいい! 捕まった時のHP減少具合もさほど多くなく、抜けるのが早い人なら3,4回は余裕で耐えられる。 謎解きに関しては、ストーリーを深く読み込む人にはむしろ難しくなる傾向。(一研究員と責任者の立場がごっちゃごちゃだったり)もっともこれは自分だけかもしれませんが… ま、そんなことは置いといて。 チョップで殴られても首を絞められても、おしっこかけられてるシチュだけですべて許せるほどたまらんでした。 バグが多いのはこれからのアプデで解消することを期待するのでボリュームがやや薄くても星4!ありがとうございました。”
DLsite

“! Here is the translation of your review into English: After completing the entire game, here are my thoughts. The puzzles are within the range of "easily solvable with a calm mind," so you're sure to get caught up if you're panicking while being chased. But that's what makes it exciting! The health point (HP) loss when caught isn't too significant, and if you're quick, you can easily withstand being caught 3 or 4 times. Regarding the puzzles, for those who deeply delve into the story, it might tend to get more challenging. (Like getting mixed up between the roles of a researcher and a supervisor) Well, this might just be me though... But, putting that aside. Even if I got chopped, strangled, or sprayed with urine, the situation was so irresistible that I could forgive everything. There are many bugs, but I'm looking forward to future updates to address these issues. So, despite the game feeling a bit light on content, it still earns 4 stars! Thank you.”
DLsite
